short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort 4 Candies of the same caliber into a cup to make it explode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Candy Sort Game inspired by sort 3D, Just Tap and drag the candies to the appropriate cup, when all are matched the cup will break giving you points! Now you can submit your progress and time to the leaderboard!
